title: Cannot find org.apache.lucene.analysis.standard in Lucene 4.0
description:
Hi all,

I have just downloaded Lucene 4.0 BETA to my PC for some new features. But I cannot find the package org.apache.lucene.analysis.standard in Lucene 4.0

Could someone help me with this issue? I have few time to finish my work.


Thank you very much.

comments.content:
Please ask usage questions on the java-user mailing list - see http://lucene.apache.org/core/discussion.html.

There are lots of jars in the distribution - check out analysis/common/lucene-analyzers-common.jar
comments.author: Steve Rowe
